text: The Crips are a street gang that was founded in 1969, by Stanley Williams and Raymond Washington in Los Angeles, California. They are rivals with the Bloods, another street gang. Crips members are known for mostly wearing blue colors which is their gang color. Some notable Crips are Snoop Dogg and Eazy-E. == Other websites == * Crips gang profile ==References== Category:Gangs Category:People from Los Angeles Category:Criminals from California
title: Crips
